comments:
Driver eclipse I20040520-1300, emf-I200405200923, 
xsd-I200405200923, uml2-S200405201001

platfrom: Windows2003 Japanese, SLES9 beta5, RHEL 3.0WS U2, AIX 5.2 ML2

steps
1) create a Simple project
2) File > New > Other..., and select UML2 Model, then click Next
